name: Long Day (SrPhI)
description:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Welcome to the game 'Long Day'! This game was made with the intentions of displaying the evil and wrong of the misuse of drugs. This was a project started back in February 28th 2022 and is apart of a project for our college, with the intention of making a game with a social justice message, ours being... "Misuse of Drugs" How to Play: -   WASD = To Move -   E = Interact -   Esc = Pause Within the game, you the player, are told what to do through the players mental within the game. Social: If you enjoyed our game and would like to support us, feel free to follow us on social media and check out the progress we made throughout our time together creating this game! Twitter Credits: Our Main Programmer: Jason
 Our Artists : CJ & Blaise
 Special Thanks to ELAM for supporting us along with Creative Assembly for mentoring us along the way!
